n1 = 
enc_flag = 
n2 = 
e = 65537

# factordb
p = 8923718840269623423569980780820579281129977088736828952007532054778839850180142413931788954605927880954601018926317426205659593318984402896542633191369573

phi = (p-1)*(q-1)
d = inverse(e,phi)
print(long_to_bytes(pow(enc_flag,d,n1)).decode())
